QuestData.Title: Ruins of Ammon
QuestData.Description:
These things seem to be everywhere and all at once!
Either this was an organized attack, or there are far more of them than we can even comprehend.
Regardless, this is bad for us... really, really bad.
$p, I need you to travel to the Ruins of Ammon and find out what the situation is like over there.
If they need help, please try to lend a hand!
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to the Ruins of Ammon.
